column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Scary prisoner says : " This girl you 're talking about ?
#Text=" Scary prisoner says : " Sure .
#Text=" Prisoner # 2 says : " Yeah .
#Text=" Sensitive ruffian says : " You 're a catch .
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know ... " Scary prisoner says : " Hey !
#Text=You 're smart , handsome , funny .
#Text=Not to mention you 're the Avatar .
#Text=" Aang says : " You guys are great .
#Text=" Sensitive ruffian says : " Do n't be afraid to tell her how you feel .
#Text=" Oyaji says : " This piece is called " The Birth of Kyoshi " .
#Text=It was painted at sunrise on this day this island was founded .
#Text=Why , it was today in fact , three hundred and seventy years ago .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Three hundred and seventy years ?
#Text=Wait , are you sure it was today ?
#Text=" Oyaji says : " Oh , seeing how it 's Kyoshi Day , yes , I 'm sure .
#Text=" Sokka says : " This ceremony did n't take place at sunrise .
#Text=It took place at sunset .
#Text=Look at the shadows .
#Text=" Katara says : " They point east .
#Text=So the sun must have been in the west .
#Text=" Oyaji says : " So what ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " If Kyoshi was in the ceremony at sunset , she could n't have been in Chin committing the crime .
#Text=She has an alibi !
#Text=" Katara says : " Honorable Mayor , we 've prepared a solid defense for the Avatar .
#Text=We did an investigation and found some very strong evidence .
#Text=" Tong says : " Evidence ?
#Text=Hmph !
#Text=That 's not how our court system works .
#Text=" Aang says : " Then how can I prove my innocence ?
#Text=" Tong says : " Simple .
#Text=I say what happened , then you say what happened , and then I decide who 's right .
#Text=That 's why we call it justice .
#Text=Because it 's " just us . "
#Text=" Tong says : " Everyone loved Chin the Great because he was so great .
#Text=Then the Avatar showed up and killed him , and that 's how it happened .
#Text=" Guard says : " The accused will now present its argument .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You can do it , Aang .
#Text=Just remember the evidence .
#Text=" Aang says : " Right ... evidence .
#Text=Ladies and gentlemen ... I 'm about to tell you what really happened .
#Text=And I will prove it with facts .
#Text=Fact number one .
#Text=Uhhh ... " Sokka says : " The footprint !
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , yeah .
#Text=You see ... I have very large feet .
#Text=Furthermore ... your temple matches your statue .
#Text=But ... I was in a painting at sunset .
#Text=So , there you have it , I 'm not guilty .
#Text=" Sokka says : " He 's dead .
#Text="
